pages.text: The Mechanical Maestro is a block which, when powered by Redstone and a Switchboard is inserted, can receive notes from a Linked Transmitter within range (16 blocks) and play an inserted Instrument accordingly.

pages.title: Mech. Maestro GUI
pages.text: Right clicking on a placed Mechanical Maestro allows you to open the Mechanical Maestro GUI and insert a Switchboard into the Switchboard slot. When a Switchboard is inserted you can configure the Switchboard properties using the GUI.

pages.title: Mech. Maestro GUI
pages.text: The Mechanical Maestro GUI also allows you to insert an Instrument that the Mechanical Maestro should play. This can be either a hand-held Instrument or a Block Instrument.$(br2)Note that if the Instrument has a Switchboard inserted into it that Switchboard will not be used.

pages.title: Switchboard Properties
pages.text: Mechanical Maestros use the following $(l:switchboard_properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Linked Transmitter$(br)- MIDI Channels
